sentences.sContent: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.sCn: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

sentences.sContent: ...we should come to terms with the fact that it's more than the technology itself that’s responsible for our habits...
...who are responsible for the bulk of all health care costs...
...And it's a plan to reduce our deficit in a balanced and responsible way...
...and establishing who is responsible for raising them will also be vital for the future of climate-vulnerable countries...
...Fewer than 4% of countries are responsible for more than half of the world's greenhouse gas emissions...
...was responsible for presenting its new security plan to the public...
...Some people strongly believe that a name is responsible for a person’s fate...
...have calculated that people kicking the habit have been responsible for a small but significant portion of the US epidemic of fatness...

remMethod.val: re ＋ spons(约定) ＋ ible → 遵守约定 → 有责任感的

words.tran: 回答；作出反应；承担责任

trans.tranCn: 需负责任的， 承担责任的； 有责任感的， 负责可靠的； 责任重大的， 重要的
trans.tranOther: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed
